title: 3 and Out - Rodgers Drama Deja Vu, Gruden v. NFL, Eagles NFC East Odds, Holdouts
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Rodgers Drama Deja Vu, Gruden v. NFL, Eagles NFC East Odds, Holdouts
description:
John discusses the constant drama Aaron Rodgers creates by repeatedly discussing retirement, why Jon Gruden’s lawsuit against the NFL is guaranteed to get uglier, why he likes the Eagles more than the Cowboys in the NFC East, and his philosophy on dealing with the looming training camp holdout contract disputes.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates. Go to  FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd
